pkgmetadata.longdescription: About=====A simple and efficient paginator.Jinja2------Jinja2 is supported via Coffin::{% with paginate(request, my_queryset) as results %} {{ results.paging }} {% for result in results.objects %} {{ result }} {% endfor %} {{ results.paging }}{% endwith %}Django------Django templatetags require django-templatetag-sugar::{% load paging_extras %}{% paginate my_queryset from request as results %}{{ results.paging }}{% for result in results.objects %} {{ result }}{% endfor %}{{ results.paging }}
